I would rely on my phone's built-in clock and reminders to schedule my day. I would set my phone to wake me up at my usual time and use the reminder function to remind me of important tasks throughout the day.
I would use natural cues to schedule my day, such as the sunrise and sunset to determine when to wake up and go to bed. I would also use my body's natural sleep-wake cycle to help me stay on track.
I would use a calendar app to schedule my day. I would create a schedule for the day and set reminders for important tasks.
I would use my intuition and sense of time to schedule my day. I would try to estimate how long tasks will take and schedule them accordingly.
I would use a voice assistant like me to schedule my day. I would give me a schedule for the day and set reminders for important tasks.
